entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 10.
entry.summary: Showers ending after midnight then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
